fields.name: NICCE Mens Capstan O/S Hood
fields.description:
Capstan O/S hood in washed black. This oversized hooded sweatshirt features a small embroidered NICCE logo to center chest. In a light cotton fabric in washed-out tones. Wear with matching joggers or layer over denim. 

Details:
Washed black
Adjustable drawstring hood
Cuffed sleeves and hem
Oversized fit
Front pouch pocket
Embroidered NICCE logo
100% COTTON
